name: Dual Invasion Hard Reset Bullet Assault
short_description: A duel based bullet hell shooter programmed in Python and Pygame. Planned are two main gamemodes: basic Duel and Invasion where the idea is to push the enemy back to his core, then destroy it. The game will have 6 different, japanesey characters and combines light strategy elements with a versus-based bullet hell shooter experience. My first real project (and reintroduction to python) that's coming up at a good pace.
